fullDescription.intro:
Create new columns holding molecular properties, computed for each structure. The computations are based on the CDK toolkit and include logP, molecular weight, number of aromatic bonds, and many others.
This node can process the input table in parallel. However, by default the usage of threads is disabled in the CDK plugin, because the CDK code may not be thread-safe in all places. If you want to enable multi-threading, change the setting in the KNIME preferences.
fullDescription.option: Select the column containing the molecular structure.
Move the available properties into the INCLUDE (right) list.

ports.inPort: Table containing molecular structure based on which the properties should be calculated.
ports.outPort: As input but with additional columns (one for each calculated property).
